verses.kjv: And after these things I saw four angels standing on the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, that the wind should not blow on the earth, nor on the sea, nor on any tree.
verses.ct: After this, I saw 4 angels positioned at the 4 corners of the earth, restraining the 4 winds of the earth so that no wind would blow on the land, the sea, or any tree.

verses.kjv: And I saw another angel ascending from the east, having the seal of the living God: and he cried with a loud voice to the four angels, to whom it was given to hurt the earth and the sea,
verses.ct: Then I saw another angel rising from the east, carrying the seal of the living God. He called out in a powerful voice to the 4 angels who had been given authority to damage the earth and the sea,

verses.kjv: Saying, Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.
verses.ct: saying, "Don't damage the earth, the sea, or the trees until we have placed a seal on the foreheads of the servants of our God."

verses.kjv: And I heard the number of them which were sealed: and there were sealed an hundred and forty and four thousand of all the tribes of the children of Israel.
verses.ct: Then I heard the total number of those who received the seal: 144,000 from every tribe of the people of Israel.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Juda were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Reuben were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Gad were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Juda, 12,000 were sealed. From the tribe of Reuben, 12,000. From the tribe of Gad, 12,000.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Aser were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Nephthalim were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Manasses were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Aser, 12,000. From the tribe of Nephthalim, 12,000. From the tribe of Manasses, 12,000.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Simeon were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Levi were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Issachar were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Simeon, 12,000. From the tribe of Levi, 12,000. From the tribe of Issachar, 12,000.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Zabulon were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Joseph were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Benjamin were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Zabulon, 12,000. From the tribe of Joseph, 12,000. From the tribe of Benjamin, 12,000.

verses.kjv: After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;
verses.ct: After this, I looked and saw an enormous crowd that no one could count, drawn from every nation, family, people group, and language. They stood in front of the throne and in front of the Lamb, dressed in white robes and holding palm branches.

verses.kjv: And cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb.
verses.ct: They shouted in a loud voice, "Salvation belongs to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!"

verses.kjv: And all the angels stood round about the throne, and about the elders and the four beasts, and fell before the throne on their faces, and worshipped God,
verses.ct: All the angels stood surrounding the throne, along with the elders and the 4 living creatures. They dropped to the ground with their faces down before the throne and worshiped God,

verses.kjv: Saying, Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, be unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: saying, "Amen! Blessing, glory, wisdom, thanksgiving, honor, power, and might belong to our God forever and ever. Amen."

verses.kjv: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?
verses.ct: Then one of the elders spoke to me and asked, "These people dressed in white robes â€” who are they, and where did they come from?"

verses.kjv: And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
verses.ct: I replied, "Sir, you know the answer." He told me, "These are the ones who have come through the great tribulation. They have washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb."

verses.kjv: Therefore are they before the throne of God, and serve him day and night in his temple: and he that sitteth on the throne shall dwell among them.
verses.ct: "That is why they stand before God's throne and serve him day and night in his temple. The one who sits on the throne will shelter them with his presence."

verses.kjv: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat.
verses.ct: "They will never be hungry again, and they will never be thirsty again. The sun will not beat down on them, and no scorching heat will touch them."

verses.kjv: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
verses.ct: "Because the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd. He will guide them to springs of living water, and God will wipe every tear from their eyes."
